lead_paragraph: Formula One is planning to add more cockpit cameras and gather biometric data from drivers, possibly as early as this season, to provide a better understanding of accidents and improve safety.

headline.print_headline: F1 Plans to Add Biometric Driver Data to Safety Mix
headline.main: F1 Plans to Add Biometric Driver Data to Safety Mix

snippet: Formula One is planning to add more cockpit cameras and gather biometric data from drivers, possibly as early as this season, to provide a better understanding of accidents and improve safety....
